name: Chained Car Race In Snow
description:
A beautiful amazing game which is specially designed for the lovers of chained car games or stunts games. This chained 3d cars game will let you enjoy the real feelings of chained car as you are driving it yourself in awesome and luxury chained cars.

You have to gear off your chained car in this car game and you will lost in all your car madness of furious chained car drag vs jet car fever which has been designed with tractor beam and you as a stunt driver have to drive probably impossible illegal & fast highway reach car kind of multi cars on asphalt city road. You will drive two cars at the same time by avoiding a chain breaker ramp. In this chained stunt car you will find all the craziness of a stunts game or racing car game.

Chained Car Race In Snow will be among amazing games. You would love to drive different luxury expensive cars in this extreme car stunts game.


Chained Car Race In Snow: Features

Beautiful Racing Cars
Amazing eye catching graphics
Smooth controls
Chained cars
Chain breaker highway racing endless runner road
Stunts Cars
